# Star SDK
> Browser game SDK with leaderboards, audio, canvas, and multiplayer. No backend needed. Works on iOS Safari.

## Documentation
- [AGENTS.md](AGENTS.md): Build, test, and contribute instructions for AI agents
- [SKILL.md](packages/star-sdk/skills/star-sdk/SKILL.md): Unified API reference
- [Audio API](packages/star-audio/PROMPT.md): Mobile-first Web Audio engine
- [Canvas API](packages/star-canvas/PROMPT.md): Game loop, DPR scaling, input
- [Leaderboard API](packages/star-leaderboard/PROMPT.md): Score submission and display

## Examples
- [Click Frenzy](examples/click-frenzy/index.html): DOM clicker game with leaderboard
- [Dodge](examples/dodge/index.html): Canvas obstacle avoidance game
- [Reaction Time](examples/reaction-time/index.html): Reaction test with inverted scoring

## Packages (npm)
- [star-sdk](https://www.npmjs.com/package/star-sdk): Umbrella package
- [star-audio](https://www.npmjs.com/package/star-audio): Mobile-first game audio
- [star-canvas](https://www.npmjs.com/package/star-canvas): Canvas game loop and DPR scaling
- [star-leaderboard](https://www.npmjs.com/package/star-leaderboard): Score submission and rankings
- [star-sdk-cli](https://www.npmjs.com/package/star-sdk-cli): CLI tools

## Quick Start
```bash
npm install star-sdk
npx star-sdk init "My Game"   # REQUIRED: creates .starrc with server-issued gameId
```

The gameId is a server-issued token. Do not fabricate one â€” it must come from `npx star-sdk init`.

```javascript
import Star from 'star-sdk';
Star.init({ gameId: '<gameId from .starrc>' });
Star.game(ctx => {
  Star.audio.preload({ coin: 'coin' });
  ctx.loop((dt) => { /* game loop */ });
  ctx.canvas.onclick = () => Star.audio.play('coin');
});
```
